about_the_game:
They needed their heroes... And it was time to act as one!


In Medic: Pacific War you are playing as an American field medic, serving in the US Military on the Pacific Front. Your job will be to take care of wounded companions in the best possible way - according to your knowledge, skills and medical equipment that you currently have.

Hard choices are not uncommon…


Often your decisions will affect how the battle, or even the whole war unfolds!
Your actions will affect not only the fate of the soldiers you help but also the entire operation. You will receive orders from superiors, soldiers of higher rank and seniority than you, but also requests from your companions. Remember - every life matters, but you can't save all of them. Decide carefully, but act quickly! And watch out - it's the war, there's no time for doubt here!

Only a true hero values the others lives above his own.
Do you have the courage to become one?


The battlefield changes with each passing moment. You will have to adapt quickly to these changes, act under time pressure and the ubiquitous threat. Avoid enemies, try not to get hurt, help those who need it, but also learn how to gauge chances to survive - your own and your injured companion. Live through this hell and help the others do the same.



Moral dilemmas, difficult choices, bombs exploding all around you, bullets flying from everywhere, screams of wounded soldiers, blood gushing from their wounds, chaos, the smell of burning, despair and longing for peace... In a word: a true picture of the Pacific War.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of blood and injuries, as usually at war.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel® Core™ i3 3225 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 or ATI® Radeon™ HD 7850 @ 2GB / AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel® Core™ i5-7400 4x3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Become a Medic - a true war hero. Survive the horror of the Pacific Front where bombs fall from the sky and rifle bullets cut the air. You are the last hope of your wounded companions. Your decisions will change the course of the battle, but not all of them will be easy to make!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
